name: Piano Fish
description:
Tap on screen to drive the fish swim and playing piano smoothly, avoid the maze of Starfishs, Coral and Anchors.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
- you will not be inhibited and stress when game over because the awesome music while playing
- Simple game but it is very hard to get high score.
- There are 4 Mode to Play:
+ Flapp Mode: Tap to Jump the Fish though tunnel
+ Swing Mode: Tap to make fish swim as the wave and across impediments
+ Flapp Piano: Play Flapp with Piano
+ Swing Piano: Play Swing with Piano
*** Try To Get Higher Score to unlock all Music Song
*** You can choose the forte to get highest score
Note: - Try to avoid the maze of starfishs, Coral , anchors and the boundary of the aquarium
- Fish swimming movements are gentle and similar to reality
- the higher level, the harder to play
Hope you have fun!
Please rate and share if you like my game.Thank you very much!
